name: Space Tribulations
overview: This is the first part of a graphical adventure game. (We don't have time enough to finish it). The interface is very similar to the game "Monkey Island". Everything in the game is made using the mouse: the first button is used to select and the second one is used cancel actions or to bypass animations. You can save just one game clicking with the left mouse button on the left part of the save/load button. clicking on the right part reload the game previously saved.
